About Us
A little about Boathouse Oyster Bar
The Boathouse Oyster Bar is one of Destin’s best kept secrets.  Located on the Destin Harbor, the Boathouse offers anything from seafood, to burgers and salads with a water view.  Come visit us to see why we have been a Destin favorite and voted Best Oysters and Gumbo for the past 30 years.
Contact
288 Harbor Blvd, Destin, FL 32541
(850) 837-3645
marketing@boathouseoysterbardestin.com

Events
Boathouse Oyster Bar
Bar Wars
Service Industry teams of 4 compete for bragging rights to be the best in the business!
Stock The Bark
Our Monthly Raffle!  $20 tickets to win over $500 in prizes - proceeds given back to Road Dogg Rescue.
Bar Wars
Service Industry teams of 4 compete for bragging rights to be the best in the business!
Stock The Bark
Our Monthly Raffle!  $20 tickets to win over $500 in prizes - proceeds given back to Road Dogg Rescue.
2025 Slacker Events
Tickets to our Slacker Events can be purchased individually for
$30 in advance
,
$35 at the door
.  We also have an
annual pass for $175
that gets you preregistered for all 7 events and a free Slacker Club membership.
(Includes you 10% off food, VIP drink discounts, and $5 off each event registered).
Contact us for more details!
marketing@boathouseoysterbardestin.com
Locals On The Harbor
Join us the First Friday of every month for FREE BEER at the Boathouse from 5-7pm, or until the keg runs out. Donations will be accepted for Road Dogg Rescue.
Purchase your raffle ticket for our monthly drawing here!
April 12:  Easter Keg Hunt @ 10am
We hide kegs. You find them.  Not as easy as you’d think!  There will be 2 winners: the first to locate and drink from all the kegs, and the one with the Best Costume.
Fundraiser for
Road Dogg Rescue
.
Register:
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/easter-keg-hunt-tickets-1141900257409
May 24th: Slacker 0.5K @ 10am
Compete individually in our 0.5K!  Pin your race number on and run, walk, skip, crawl up the hill and back while competing in rigorous events like donut hole eating, oyster shooting, and more.  We will have a variety of stops to complete before crossing the finishing line., keeping up the Slacker vibes. Dress to impress!
Register:
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/8th-annual-east-pass-slacker-05k-tickets-1141912574249
June 14th: Forrest 5K Run/Walk
Join us as we honor our friend Forrest Dalton in a 5K fun run/walk on Saturday June 14th. Race will begin at the Marler Parking lot, with awards and free keg following at Boathouse Oyster Bar.
Register:
https://boathousedestin.itsyourrace.com/event.aspx
Tackle Boxes Not XBoxes: Kids Fishing Day!
Aboard the American Spirit Party Boat!  Join us as we spend the morning reeling in fish from the Gulf of Mexico!
Monday July 14: Ages 5-10
Monday July 21: Ages 11-15
Cost: $60 per kid and includes event swag, lunch, water and 6 hours of fishing.
Limited to 50 kids on each date so don’t delay!
Register:
https://www.facebook.com/events/1494568918186166/1494568924852832/
August 24 – Jerk Off
We are calling all beef jerky enthusiasts to compete in a knock down, drag out, ole fashioned jerk off. Come join our Circle Jerk as contestants try and vote on the BEST Beef Jerky along the Emerald Coast. All event proceeds will benefit Prostate Cancer Research.
Registration coming soon!
September 13: Slacker Olympics
Another drinking game for those slackers with a competitive edge.  Put those 12oz curls you’ve been practicing to work as teams of 4 will compete in 6 different games, to be announced soon.
This is an adoption event and proceeds will benefit
Road Dogg Animal Rescue
.  Costumes are encouraged and the more dog food you bring, the more drink tickets we can hand out. Cheers to getting day drunk!
Info coming soon!
November 15: Turkey Trot
Another East Pass Slacker 0.5K.  Pin that number on your T-shirt, you’ve prepared your whole life for this.  Start the morning with a Bloody Mary as you walk, skip or jump up the hill to our partnered stops, where you’ll find out who can eat hula hoop fastest or is the best at the toilet paper toss.  Bring 5 non perishable food items for Food For Thought Outreach and gain extra drink tickets.  Prizes for best outfit at every Slacker Event so bring your A Game.
Info coming soon!
Sunday December 14: Dock the Halls
Our annual Holiday Give Back campaign, this time we partner with Children in Crisis and ask slackers to bring toys for those extra drink tickets.  Individuals or teams will visit our partner locations who will put your skills to the test by having slackers compete in activities like hop scotch, hula hooping, toilet paper toss, corn hole and more.  Grab all your slacker friends and come on down – It’s for a good cause!
Info coming soon!
